name: 奥利维亚·布罗迪
name_full: 奥利维亚·布罗迪 Olivia Brody
introduction: Olivia is a creative, witty and mature young actress based in London. She has an excellent American and English accent.Olivia's first feature was Golda, directed by Oscar winner Guy Nattiv, with Helen Mirren. Olivia recently completed The Burial, directed by Maggie Betts, with Jamie Foxx, where she plays Tommy Lee Jones' granddaughter and Barbie, directed by Greta Gerwig, with Margot Robbie and Ryan Gosling. Her TV debut was playing Cary Grant's daughter in Archie, directed by Paul Andrew Williams.She enjoys singing, dancing and playing pranks on her family.
